1.title: Let the Feast of Fools Begin

episode of.title: Like Me, Like a Joker (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: In the Madhouse Arkham Asylum, we meet doctor Harleen Quinzel, who will soon be Harley Quinn and joker's partner. Her assistant Horace Sufoeno attends her. They're searched by guard Frank Boles. With a trick the doctor hides a prohibited object: a playing card. When she got near to joker's room, the doctor changes her clothes into Arkham Asylum patient, for the sperimental therapy she is trying with Joker. In the future we find an old and dying Joker in his den/theatre. Joker is engaged in a monologue/last will where he praises madness, and in the end he activates a ...

2.title: Day One

episode of.title: Like Me, Like a Joker (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: In the past a busy Liutenant Jim Gordon is involved with continuous steakouts. A night, he gets a call from the telephone switchboard warning him about Wayne's murder. Some time after, Liutenant Harvey Bullock tells Gordon he was able to deceive Alfred, and that Gordon could bring Bruce home, to extort him more informations than during interrogation. Gordon introduces himself to Bruce, and fairly gets his faith. Bruce tells him about his parents' death and that he can't remember their murderer's face. Gordon doesn't believe him, and records their conversation, ...

imdb.plot outline: For the first time the stories of Gotham City and its characters are told by an enigmatic storyteller, the bitter enemy of the Dark Knight: the Joker. Through the past, present and future you will discover the reasons that made the famous characters of the Batman saga as we know them.
imdb.title: Like Me, Like a Joker
plot: For the first time the stories of Gotham City and its characters are told by an enigmatic storyteller, the bitter enemy of the Dark Knight: the Joker. Through the past, present and future you will discover the reasons that made the famous characters of the Batman saga as we know them.

For the first time the stories of Gotham City and its characters are told by an enigmatic storyteller, the bitter enemy of the Dark Knight: the Joker. Through the past, present and future you will discover the reasons that made the famous characters of the Batman saga as we know them. Digging into their origins, you will see old and new faces fighting each other in unknown battles, listen their secrets and revealing confessions and follow the heroes and the villains until the end of their destiny. Because the fight is eternal until we make fun of it.
